info.description:
Tools for Prestans 3
====================

A `WSGI <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Server_Gateway_Interface>`_ compliant `REST <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer>`_ micro framework.


Installation
^^^^^^^^^^^^

We recommend installing Tools for Prestans 3 via PyPi:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install -U prestans3-tools
info.name: prestans3-tools
info.summary: Tools to help build APIs using the Prestans 3 framework
info.html_description:
A WSGI compliant REST micro framework.

Installation

We recommend installing Tools for Prestans 3 via PyPi:

$ pip install -U prestans3-tools
